name: Longsword
desc: A versatile, one-handed sword with a long blade, favored by knights and soldiers.

properties.Mastery: Sap (on hit, impose disadvantage on target’s next attack roll】

name: Shortbow
desc: A smaller bow made of wood, easy to handle from horseback or in tight quarters.

properties.Mastery: Vex (on hit, gain advantage on next attack vs same target】

name: Leather Armor
desc: A jacket and leggings of toughened leather. Offers basic protection without hindering movement.

name: Chain Mail
desc: Interlocking metal rings worn over padding. Protects well but is noisy and heavy.

properties.Stealth: Disadvantage on Stealth checks (due to clinking metal】

name: Shield
desc: Wooden or metal handheld shield. Increases defense when wielded.

name: Explorer’s Pack
desc: A backpack containing essential gear for exploration: a bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, torches, rations, and waterskin, plus 50 feet of hempen rope strapped to the side.

properties.Includes: Backpack, Bedroll, Mess kit, Tinderbox, 10 Torches, 10 days Rations, Waterskin, 50 ft. Hempen Rope

name: Backpack
desc: A sturdy leather backpack with straps. It can hold up to 1 cubic foot/30 pounds of gear inside.

name: 50 ft. Hempen Rope
desc: A 50-foot length of hempen rope. Useful for climbing, tying, or securing items.

properties.Strength: Can hold about 1,000 lb of weight before breaking

name: Torch
desc: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. When lit, it burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light 20 feet further).

properties.Light: Bright light 20 ft, dim light additional 20 ft; burns 1 hour
properties.Special: Can be used as an improvised melee weapon (1 fire damage)

name: Rations (1 day)
desc: Dried foods suitable for travel: jerky, dried fruit, hardtack. One day's worth of sustenance for one person.

properties.Uses: Consumed to avoid starvation during travel

name: Crowbar
desc: A metal bar with a curved, forked end. Grants leverage for prying objects open or breaking through barriers.

properties.Uses: Using a crowbar gives advantage on Strength checks made to force open a door or container

name: Lantern, Hooded
desc: A hooded lantern that burns oil to produce light. You can lower the hood to dim the light.

properties.Light: Bright light 30 ft, dim light 30 ft (can be reduced to dim 5 ft when hooded)
properties.Fuel: Burns 1 pint of oil in 6 hours

name: Waterskin
desc: A sturdy leather pouch for carrying water (or other liquids). Can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.
